<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="支援リクエスト">2dd8915983c63210f6b1fb96feaad377</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:67916d15830a3210f6b1fb96feaad365</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Kokoro Step 2 Trigger</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    // 当用户选择了地点后...
    // 1. 史莱姆显示第二个问题
    g_form.setDisplay('wish', true);
    
    // 2. (可选) 增加一个漂亮的淡入动画 (通过 CSS class)
    // 这里我们简单处理，直接显示
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-26 06:49:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cac2eaa18382b210f6b1fb96feaad3e3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Kokoro Step 2 Trigger</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Kokoro Shelter" source="x_1821654_kokoro_0">80ba4d9583863210f6b1fb96feaad3b2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Kokoro Shelter">80ba4d9583863210f6b1fb96feaad3b2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_cac2eaa18382b210f6b1fb96feaad3e3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-26 07:14:07</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
